messages.message:
Brian
I am learning so much from that message board.
Yes, it can be quite interesting

Brian
Are you Christian?
I really can't tell the difference anymore.
Oh,hell(I don't believe in god so heaven and hell are put as well)..no!

Brian
What happened to you?
Your job says Disabled, what does that mean?
I  disabled due to a stroke in 2012 so I do not work

Brian
Oh no!  I am sorry.  I had kidney stones, that's the worst I have ever felt.  Are you getting enough exercise?
Yes,regular pt plus I do what I can,I was left with left side weakness(can't voluntarily move left arm and leg by they both tumor on their own

Brian
I've heard these things get better with time an exercise. Is that helping?
Typically most recovery happens in the first 5-18 months.its been 26 months for me and I've gotten some movement in left leg though I could still improve over time

Brian
Wow.  That is rough.  I am glad we could talk on a personal level.  I've learned a lot about social networking recently.  I don't think it is common for people to meet strangers online, what do you think?
Everyone I talked to from Atheist Beings seem pretty surprised to get a personal though out response.  I think a lot of social media has the problem of people just running in to each other in passing, like in cars we rarely get to know the other drivers behind the wheel.
